name: spark-js-sdk-example
description: An example app for Cisco Spark's JavaScript SDK.
author: Cisco

scripts.start-dev: npm run build && npm run watch | node server.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html && npm run build-images && npm run build-fonts && npm run build-font-awesome
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js | npm run watch-css
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p public/js; browserify -t brfs js/index.js -o public/js/indexBundle.js && browserify js/login.js -o public/js/loginBundle.js
scripts.watch-js: mkdir -p public/js; watchify -t brfs js/index.js -o public/js/indexBundle.js | watchify js/login.js -o public/js/loginBundle.js
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p public/css; node-sass --include-path scss scss/main.scss public/css/main.css
scripts.watch-css: mkdir -p public/css; node-sass -w --include-path scss scss/main.scss public/css/main.css
scripts.build-html: mkdir -p public; ln -f index.html public/index.html && ln -f login.html public/login.html
scripts.build-fonts: mkdir -p public/fonts; cp node_modules/mki-font-ciscosans/files/CiscoSansExtraLight.otf public/fonts/; cp -r fonts/ public/fonts/
scripts.build-font-awesome: mkdir -p public/fonts; mkdir -p public/css; cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css/ public/css; cp node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* public/fonts/
scripts.test: npm run unit-test && npm run integration-test
